member.name: IF_COUNTED_STRING
member.summary: The IF_COUNTED_STRING structure specifies a counted string for NDIS interfaces.

member.name: IF_COUNTED_STRING.Length
member.summary: A USHORT value that contains the length, in bytes, of the string.

member.name: IF_COUNTED_STRING.String
member.summary: A WCHAR buffer that contains the string. The string does not need to be null-terminated.
